meanings.definition: The quality or state of being swarthy or dark in complexion.
meanings.sent1: Her swartness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: His swartness was a result of spending hours under the sun.
meanings.sent3: The swartness of the painting gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent4: The swartness of the night sky was broken only by the twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The swartness of the cave added to its eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act or process of becoming swarthy or dark in complexion.
meanings.sent1: The gradual swartness of his skin was noticeable after a summer of outdoor activities.
meanings.sent2: The swartness of her complexion was a result of her Mediterranean heritage.
meanings.sent3: The sudden swartness of his face after eating chocolate cake surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The swartness of the room increased as the sun set outside.
meanings.sent5: The swartness of the fruit indicated it was ripe and ready to eat.
